thread.title: Ex-NFL star, Heisman winner Eddie George tackles Broadway
thread.title_full: Ex-NFL star, Heisman winner Eddie George tackles Broadway - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Ex-NFL star, Heisman winner Eddie George tackles Broadway
text:
JOHN BAZEMORE/AP Eddie George, a four-time Pro Bowler with the Titans, will appear in the Broadway musical 'Chicago.' When Eddie George came to New York in 1995, he left with the Heisman Trophy.
Twenty years later, he will claim the New York stage again on Broadway. He is scheduled to perform in "Chicago" as lawyer Billy Flynn.
The show will run from January 11-February 28.
George, 42, starred in college at Ohio State before being drafted in the first round of the NFL Draft by the Houston Oilers. He earned honors as a four-time Pro Bowler with the Tennessee Titans.
 HERE.
Tags: eddie george
